edu.cmu.sphinx.linguist.language.grammar
Class TextAlignerGrammar

java.lang.Object
  edu.cmu.sphinx.linguist.language.grammar.Grammar
      edu.cmu.sphinx.linguist.language.grammar.TextAlignerGrammar
All Implemented Interfaces:
ResultListener, GrammarInterface, Configurable, java.util.EventListener
public class TextAlignerGrammar
extends Grammar
implements ResultListener

Creates a grammar from a text. This grammar could be used to create a precise recognizer that will force align the text with the audio.
